law.catch_line: Notification to Transportation Cabinet of permits for mine openings and of mine closings under authority of cabinet.
law.text: The cabinet shall notify the secretary of the Transportation Cabinet every six (6) months of permits issued for mine openings and mine closings under the authority of the cabinet.
law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 488, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1994.
